Generated Narrative: StructureDefinition EHDSServiceRequest

NameFlagsCard.TypeDescription & Constraints
EHDSServiceRequest 0..*EHDSDataSetService request model

Elements defined in Ancestors:header
Instances of this logical model can be the target of a Reference
serviceText 0..1stringService text
serviceCode 0..1CodeableConceptService code
Binding Description: (preferred): LOINC, NPU, SNOMED CT
reasonCode 0..*CodeableConceptReason code
Binding Description: (preferred): ICD-10 (ICD-11 when available), SNOMED CT, Orphacode
quantity 0..1QuantityQuantity
anatomicLocation 0..*EHDSBodyStructureAnatomic location
reasonReference[x] 0..*Reason reference
reasonReferenceEHDSObservationEHDSObservation
reasonReferenceEHDSConditionEHDSCondition
reasonReferenceEHDSMedicationEHDSMedication
priority 0..1CodeableConceptPriority
Binding Description: (preferred): HL7 Request priority
supportingInformation[x] 0..*Supporting information
supportingInformationEHDSObservationEHDSObservation
supportingInformationEHDSConditionEHDSCondition
supportingInformationEHDSProcedureEHDSProcedure
supportingInformationEHDSMedicationAdministrationEHDSMedicationAdministration
specimen 0..*EHDSSpecimenSpecimen
encounter 0..1EHDSEncounterEncounter
occurrence[x] 0..1Occurrence
occurrenceDateTimedateTime
occurrencePeriodPeriod
patientInstructions 0..1stringPatient instructions
coverage 0..*EHDSCoverageCoverage

Documentation for this format

name: EHDSServiceRequest
title: Service request model
description: EHDS refined base model for Specification of requested service or services

element.definition: EHDS refined base model for Specification of requested service or services

element.short: Common header for all patient-related data
element.definition: Common header for all patient-related data
Patient/subject information
Business identifier for the object
Resource authoring details

element.short: Author(s) by whom the resource was/were authored. Multiple authors could be provided.
element.definition: Author(s) by whom the resource was/were authored. Multiple authors could be provided.
Date and time of authoring/issuing

element.short: Date and time of the last update to the resource (may be used for technical corrections).
element.definition: Date and time of the last update to the resource (may be used for technical corrections).

element.short: Status of the resource or document
element.definition: Status of the resource or document

element.short: Reason for the current status of the resource.
element.definition: Reason for the current status of the resource.

element.short: Language in which the resource is written. Language is expressed by the IETF language tag.
element.definition: Language in which the resource is written. Language is expressed by the IETF language tag.
Textual description of the requested service
A code that identifies a particular service (i.e., procedure, diagnostic investigation, or panel of investigations) that have been requested.

Health conditions affecting the health of the patient and are important to be known for a health professional during a health encounter. Clinical conditions of the subject relevant for the results interpretation.

binding.description: ICD-10 (ICD-11 when available), SNOMED CT, Orphacode

element.definition: Amount of requested services of the same type
Anatomic location and laterality where the procedure should be performed. This is the target site.
Indicates another resource that provides a justification for why this service is being requested.
Indicates how quickly the ServiceRequest should be addressed with respect to other requests.
Health conditions relevant for the results interpretation, e.g. fasting status, sex for clinical use, etc.
Specimens to be used by the laboratory procedure
An encounter that provides additional information about the healthcare context in which this request is made.
When service should occur
Patient or consumer-oriented instructions
Insurance or medical plan or a payment agreement.
